document.full_text: french president nicolas sarkozy threw his weight behind mario draghi's candidacy to head the european central bank on tuesday, giving a major boost to the bank of italy chief's hopes of succeeding jean-claude trichet.
document.title: france's sarkozy backs draghi for ecb presidency
lines_and_colors: french president nicolas sarkozy threw his weight behind mario draghi's candidacy to head the european central bank on tuesday, giving a major boost to the bank of italy chief's hopes of succeeding jean-claude trichet.
